page.title: 01A GENERAL SURVEY OF UPTON.
page.content: {Upton-on-Severn}as its name suggests is a town on a river. It is a small town of great character and charm which has retained an independent and relaxed outlook on to-day's rapidly changing world. A place where the shopper and visitor will find the traditional values of courtesy and service. Specialist businesses have thrived in little towns like Upton because people appreciate the advantages of being able to park easily near the shops of which Upton offers a wide selection from a famous map shop,a handmade chocolate factory and a fishing tackle shop to old bookshops. When you fancy a rest from exploring its quiet corners there are plenty of pubs and restaurants in which to relax.
